subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Ricky Hatton landed a left hook to the body in the fourth round last night in Las Vegas, dropping Jose Luis Castillo to one knee and ending what had been a brawl between the world’s top 140-pounders. Hatton remained undefeated in 43 fights and retained his International Boxing Organization light-welterweight title.
